title: Machine Learning-Enhanced SPR-based Optical Biosensor for Cancer Cell Detection
description: A research project focused on developing a Surface Plasmon Resonance (SPR)-based optical biosensor enhanced with machine learning techniques for the detection of cancer cells.

title: Online Exam System
description: A secure platform featuring robust authentication, comprehensive exam management with timers, real-time result generation, and user profiles.

title: News Portal
description: A dynamic news platform with full article CRUD functionality, a rich text editor, categories, tags, comments, user authentication, and an admin dashboard.

title: E-Learning Platform
description: An e-learning site with user authentication, course and module management, student enrollment capabilities, and a fully responsive UI.
